attributes.action: change school league tables to also indicate the number of gifted and talented children in the school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By creating league tables that record the number of gifted and talented children in schools the school will be given an incentive to encourage children to attain targets well above the average ones that they currently do.  Therefore bright children will be stretched more rather than ignored because the school is concentrating on getting the low achievers up to the required levels.
